title: please help identify original font
content:
Using a nice sketchy font called Karabine, but it has no capital letters and very limited symbols (such as no £ etc.). I need to identify which font it has been based on so I can create the missing symbols from the right lettershapes. Or an alternate font which has a more complete set of symbols would be a big help also. Any help would be really appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [karabine-font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823124834/http:/typophile.com/files/karabine-font.jpg) | 38.36 KB |
author: JamesMaybs

comments.content: according to the comments on this font's dafont page, Ryuk is correct in that Georgia was the base.
